alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles; Ventura (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 24 at 9:51PM PST until February 24 at 10:45PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: The National Weather Service in OXNARD has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Ventura County in southwestern California... Northwestern Los Angeles County in southwestern California... * Until 1045 PM PST. * At 946 PM PST, a convective line of storms extended from near Moorpark to near Point Mugu, moving east at 15 to 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Simi Valley... Van Nuys... Woodland Hills... Malibu... Santa Monica... Calabasas... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
